pageTitle: General Education: Segment III - San Francisco State University Bulletin 2012 - 2013
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {866=Search 2012-2013 SF State Bulletin, 5418=Please note: In order to facilitate graduation, beginning Fall 2012 students may complete any 3 courses in Segment III (item 2 in the General Requirements below) while also satisfying the other components of this requirement. In the past, students had to take a minimum of 2 courses in a single cluster.}
